languages.text: Until the end of combat, all {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt to enemies by damage-over-time effects is increased by +100% after all other modifiers. This effect stacks and can be inflicted by more than one {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Until the end of combat, every time a DoT deals damage to an enemy, it's final damage is increased by 100%. Stacks.

Until the end of combat, all damage dealt to enemies by damage-over-time effects is increased by +100% after all other modifiers. Multiple applications of this effect from two or more Executioners stack.

Until the end of combat, all damage dealt to enemies by damage-over-time effects is increased by +100% after all other modifiers. Multiple applications of this effect from two or more Executioners stack.
Until the end of combat, all damage dealt to enemies by damage-over-time effects is increased by +100% after all other modifiers. This effect stacks and can be inflicted by more than one Executioner.

Until the end of combat, all {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt to enemies by damage-over-time effects is increased by +100% after all other modifiers. This effect stacks and can be inflicted by more than one {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}.

languages.text: Hasta el final del combate, todo el {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} que infligen los efectos de daño continuado a los enemigos aumenta un +100 % después de aplicar todos los demás modificadores. Este efecto es acumulativo y puede aplicarlo más de un {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}ejecutor{/g}.
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, all {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt to enemies by damage-over-time effects is increased by +100% after all other modifiers. This effect stacks and can be inflicted by more than one {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Hasta el final del combate, todo el {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} que infligen los efectos de daño continuado a los enemigos aumenta un +100 % después de aplicar todos los demás modificadores. Este efecto es acumulativo y puede aplicarlo más de un {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}ejecutor{/g}.

languages.text: 戦闘が終了するまで、敵に継続ダメージで与えられるすべての{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が、他のすべての調整を受けた後、+100%増加する。この効果はスタックし、複数の{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}エクスキューショナー{/g}が与えることができる。
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, all {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt to enemies by damage-over-time effects is increased by +100% after all other modifiers. This effect stacks and can be inflicted by more than one {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 戦闘が終了するまで、敵に継続ダメージで与えられるすべての{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が、他のすべての調整を受けた後、+100%増加する。この効果はスタックし、複数の{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}エクスキューショナー{/g}が与えることができる。

languages.text: 所有由持续伤害效果造成的伤害，当所有{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}系数结算完成之后，会再额外提高100%伤害，效果持续至战斗结束。此效果可叠加，且可以由多名{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}行刑者{/g}触发。
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, all {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt to enemies by damage-over-time effects is increased by +100% after all other modifiers. This effect stacks and can be inflicted by more than one {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 所有由持续伤害效果造成的伤害，当所有{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}系数结算完成之后，会再额外提高100%伤害，效果持续至战斗结束。此效果可叠加，且可以由多名{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}行刑者{/g}触发。

languages.text: Bis zum Ende des Kampfes erhöht sich der {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} aller Schaden-über-Zeit-Effekte nach allen anderen Modifikatoren um +100 %. Dieser Effekt ist stapelbar und kann von mehreren {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Henker{/g}n angewandt werden.
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, all {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt to enemies by damage-over-time effects is increased by +100% after all other modifiers. This effect stacks and can be inflicted by more than one {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Bis zum Ende des Kampfes erhöht sich der {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} aller Schaden-über-Zeit-Effekte nach allen anderen Modifikatoren um +100 %. Dieser Effekt ist stapelbar und kann von mehreren {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Henker{/g}n angewandt werden.

languages.text: Jusqu'à la fin du combat, tous les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} infligés aux ennemis par les effets de dégâts progressifs sont augmentés de +100 % une fois tous les autres modificateurs appliqués. Cet effet est cumulable et peut être infligé par plusieurs {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}exécuteurs{/g}.
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, all {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt to enemies by damage-over-time effects is increased by +100% after all other modifiers. This effect stacks and can be inflicted by more than one {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Jusqu'à la fin du combat, tous les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} infligés aux ennemis par les effets de dégâts progressifs sont augmentés de +100 % une fois tous les autres modificateurs appliqués. Cet effet est cumulable et peut être infligé par plusieurs {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}exécuteurs{/g}.

languages.text: До конца боя весь наносимый противникам периодический {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} увеличивается на 100% после применения других модификаторов. Этот эффект суммируется и может быть применен несколькими {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}палачами{/g}.
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, all {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt to enemies by damage-over-time effects is increased by +100% after all other modifiers. This effect stacks and can be inflicted by more than one {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}.

traits.locale_text: До конца боя весь наносимый противникам периодический {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} увеличивается на 100% после применения других модификаторов. Этот эффект суммируется и может быть применен несколькими {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}палачами{/g}.

До конца боя весь наносимый противникам периодический {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} увеличивается на 100% после применения других модификаторов. Этот эффект суммируется и может быть применен несколькими {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}палачами{/g}.
